item.title: Getting Started
item.description:
Installation

  1. Download dmg file from the download button.
  2. Open a downloaded dmg file.
  3. Move ShowyEdge icon into Applications icon.
  4. Open ShowyEdge from Apps.
  5. Menu bar icon will be added.

What’s next?

  • Configuration

item.title: Pricing
item.description: ShowyEdge is an open source software and you can use it without any purchases.
